name: Bombastic Boomerang Bros. (Early Demo)
description:
Bombastic Boomerang Bros. is a frantic 4-player multiplayer action game in which you play a game of deadly hot potato, but with a boomerang! Play against your friends as you all try to keep the boomerang away from you, or you're in for a explosive surprise!

Keyboard Controls: Only two players are available with this method. It is also the only way to use the Main Menu

Player 1:

WASD: Move and Aim throws

N: Jump

B: Throw the boomerang if held

Player 2:

UHJK: Move and Aim throws

P: Jump

O: Throw the boomerang if held

W and D in the Main Menu: Move selector in the Menu

Enter: selects a menu option when in the main Menu. Can only be used with a keyboard

Controller controls: Use a controller to replace the need to use a keyboard. NOTE! you need three or more controllers to have more than two players. So, if you have one controller, that will be used for the first players movement, not the third! You also cannot use the main menu with the controller.

D-pad and Left Stick: Move and Aim

Bottom Button: Jump

Left Button: Throw

Thanks and Enjoy!
